collections.name: all_prevalences

properties.name: ITEM
properties.description: Name of the item/condition/medication measured for prevalence.

properties.name: POPULATION_TYPE
properties.description: Population category used to compute prevalence.

properties.name: PREVALENCE_PERCENTAGE
properties.description: Rate of occurrence as a percentage (0-100).

collections.description: Aggregated prevalence metrics for simulated conditions, procedures, and medications across the synthetic population, including counts and rates.

collections.name: allergies

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.

collections.description: Allergy/intolerance records linked to a specific encounter and patient, with SNOMED code and description.

collections.name: careplans

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.

properties.name: REASONCODE
properties.description: Code indicating the reason for the event/record.

properties.name: REASONDESCRIPTION
properties.description: Text describing the reason for the event/record.

collections.description: Care plan activities spanning a period for a patient and encounter, including reason codes.

collections.name: claims

properties.name: BILLABLEPERIOD
properties.description: Billing period start date for the claim.

properties.name: DIAGNOSIS
properties.description: Primary diagnosis code/text on the claim.

collections.description: Billing claims associated with encounters and patients, including diagnosis and total amount.

collections.name: conditions

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.

collections.description: Diagnosed conditions for a patient and encounter, including code and textual description.

collections.name: encounters

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.

properties.name: REASONCODE
properties.description: Code indicating the reason for the event/record.

properties.name: REASONDESCRIPTION
properties.description: Text describing the reason for the event/record.

collections.description: Clinical encounters (visits) for patients, including date, visit code/description, and reason codes.

collections.name: immunizations

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.

collections.name: medications

properties.name: CODE

properties.name: REASONCODE
properties.description: Code indicating the reason for the event/record.

properties.description: Text describing the reason for the event/record.

collections.name: observations

properties.name: CODE
properties.description: Coded value (often SNOMED/ICD/LOINC) representing the clinical concept.

properties.name: DESCRIPTION
properties.description: Human-readable description of the coded concept.
